set_value.name: $factionPriorityText
set_value.exact: if $factionPriority == 0 then 'Player Only' else if $factionPriority == 1 then 'Foreign First' else 'Equal Priority'

debug_text.text:
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === TRADE SEARCH START ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Pilot: ' + $pilotInfo + '
Current Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Max Distance: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps' + '
Min ROI: ' + $minROI + '%' + '
Min Absolute Profit: ' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr' + '
Ship Cargo: ' + ($ship.cargo.capacity.all - $ship.cargo.free.all) + '/' + $ship.cargo.capacity.all
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') No suitable cached trade found, performing live market search'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ“Š BEST TRADE SELECTED:' + '
 ðŸ“¦ Ware: ' + $bestTrade.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' (x' + $bestTrade.$Amount + ')' + '
 ðŸ“ BUY from: ' + $bestTrade.$BuyOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($bestTrade.$BuyPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“ SELL to: ' + $bestTrade.$SellOffer.owner.knownname + ' @ ' + ($bestTrade.$SellPrice / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸš€ Distance: ' + $bestTrade.$Distance + ' jumps' + '
 ðŸ’° Profit: ' + ($bestTrade.$Profit / 100) + ' Cr' + '
 ðŸ“ˆ ROI: ' + @$bestTrade.$ROI + '%' + '
 ðŸ“Š Score: ' + $bestTrade.$Score + '
 âš Risk: ' + $bestTrade.$Risk

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === NO TRADES FOUND ANALYSIS ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Search params: Dist=' + $maxDistance + ', MinROI=' + $minROI + '%, MinAbsoluteProfit=' + ($minAbsoluteProfit / 100) + ' Cr'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] No profitable trades found for ' + $ship.knownname
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Search lock released'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ” SEARCH COMPLETE (active: ' + global.$GT_SearchQueue.$ActiveSearches + '/' + global.$GT_SearchQueue.$MaxConcurrent + ', queued: ' + global.$GT_SearchQueue.$Ships.count + ')'
'[GT-Cache] âš Cache too small (' + global.$GT_TradeCache.count + ' entries) - forcing live search to replenish'
'[GT-Cache-DEBUG] Cache has ' + global.$GT_TradeCache.count + ' trade entries'

do_if.value: not $cacheEntry? or not $cacheEntry.$BuyOffer? or not $cacheEntry.$SellOffer? or not $cacheEntry.$Timestamp?

debug_text.text: '[GT-Cache] â›” Skipping cached trade (dangerous sector, threat exceeds risk tolerance)'
'[GT-Cache] â›” Skipping cached trade for ' + $cacheEntry.$BuyOffer.ware.name + ' (illegal ware, AllowIllegal=' + $allowIllegal + ') - continuing to next entry'
'[GT-Cache-DEBUG] Entry ' + $i + ': Ware=' + @$cacheEntry.$WareName + ', CachedEff=' + $efficiency + ', BestScore=' + $bestScore + ', WillQuery=' + $willQuery
'[GT-Cache] âš Cached stations no longer valid: Buy=' + $buyExists + ', Sell=' + $sellExists

'[GT-Cache] âœ… FRESH offers validated for cached trade: ' + $ware.name + ' (CachedROI=' + $cacheEntry.$ROI + '%, FreshROI=' + $freshROI + '%, Threshold=' + $cacheThreshold + '%, Profit=' + ($freshProfit/100) + ' Cr)'
'[GT-Cache] âš Fresh trade below threshold: ' + $ware.name + ' (FreshROI=' + $freshROI + '%, Threshold=' + $cacheThreshold + '%, Profit=' + ($freshProfit/100) + ' Cr)'
'[GT-Cache] âš Fresh trade not profitable: ' + $ware.name + ' (Profit=' + ($freshProfit/100) + ' Cr)'
'[GT-Cache] âš Fresh offers not available for cached trade: ' + $ware.name
'[GT-Cache] âœ… Cache HIT for ' + $ship.idcode + ': Found cached trade (Score: ' + $bestScore + ', checked: ' + $checkedEntries + ', valid: ' + $validEntries + ', expired: ' + $expiredEntries + ')'
'[GT-Cache] âŒ Cache MISS for ' + $ship.idcode + ': No valid cached trades (checked: ' + $checkedEntries + ', expired: ' + $expiredEntries + ')'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ Home base: ' + @$homeBase.knownname + ' (sector: ' + $homeSector.knownname + ') [source: ' + $homeBaseSource + ']'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Merged ' + $stations.count + ' stations (pre-sorted by distance)'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš¡ EARLY EXIT: Reached distance limit at station ' + $i + '/' + $stations.count
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Total offers collected: ' + $allSellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $allBuyOffers.count + ' buy'
'[GT-Cache] âœ… Trade cached: ' + $sellOffer.ware.name + ', ROI=' + $roi + '%, Profit=' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr, Distance=' + $totalDistance + ' jumps'
'[GT-Cache] âš Skipped caching trade with invalid data'
'[GT-FLEET] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Selected non-conflicted trade (Score: ' + $nonConflictedBestScore + ')'
'[GT-FLEET] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ Using best trade (Score: ' + $crossStationBestScore + ') - may conflict with active fleet routes'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and $bestTrade and $bestTrade.$BuyStation? and $bestTrade.$SellStation?

debug_text.text: '[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') SELECTED TRADE DOCKING: Ship=' + $ship.class + ' | BUY=' + @$bestTrade.$BuyStation.knownname + ' [' + $buyDockStatus + '] | SELL=' + @$bestTrade.$SellStation.knownname + ' [' + $sellDockStatus + ']'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') DOCKING RESTRICTIONS: Rejected ' + $tradesRejectedDocking + ' trade pairs due to incompatible docking (ship class: ' + $ship.class + ')'

'[GalaxyTrader MK3 DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') === SELL SEARCH START ===' + '
Ship: ' + $ship.knownname + '
Current Sector: ' + $ship.sector.knownname + '
Max Distance: ' + $maxDistance + ' jumps' + '
Min Profit: ' + $minProfit + ' Cr'
'[GalaxyTrader MK3] ' + $ship.knownname + ' found sell opportunity'
